preset_queries.comment: Preset Queries that can be used for querying the graph.

queries.person: CONSTRUCT { ?letter cds:has_sender ?sender; cds:has_addressee ?addressee; cds:has_place_of_exposition ?place; cds:has_topic ?topic. ?sender rdfs:label ?sender_label.    ?addresse rdfs:label ?addressee_label.} WHERE {     ?letter cds:has_sender ?sender;              cds:has_addressee ?addressee;      		cds:has_place_of_exposition ?place;            cds:has_topic ?topic.    ?sender rdfs:label ?sender_label.    ?addresse rdfs:label ?addressee_label.    FILTER("Louis-Benoît Picard"@en = ?sender_label || "Louis-Benoît Picard"@en = ?addressee_label ).}
queries.topic: CONSTRUCT { ?letter cds:has_sender ?sender; cds:has_addressee ?addressee; cds:has_place_of_exposition ?place; cds:has_topic ?topic. ?topic rdfs:label ?topic_label. } WHERE {      ?letter cds:has_sender ?sender;               cds:has_addressee ?addressee;       		cds:has_place_of_exposition ?place;             cds:has_topic ?topic.     ?topic rdfs:label ?topic_label.     FILTER("Wohnen"@en = ?topic_label). }
